meanings.sent1: The king will inthrone his son as the new ruler.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, they will inthrone the queen with great honor.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to inthrone itself on the cozy armchair.
meanings.sent4: The teacher inthroned the student as the leader of the class project.
meanings.sent5: Inthrone your favorite teddy bear on the toy throne for a royal tea party.

meanings.sent1: The people inthroned their chosen leader with authority.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ritual inthroned the warrior as the new chief.
meanings.sent3: The magician inthroned the rabbit as the ruler of the hat.
meanings.sent4: The superhero was inthroned with the power to protect the city.
meanings.sent5: Inthrone the brave knight with the magical sword to save the kingdom.

meanings.sent1: The queen will inthrone herself gracefully on the royal seat.
meanings.sent2: The ceremony will inthrone the prince on the golden throne.
meanings.sent3: The little girl tried to inthrone her doll on the tiny chair.
meanings.sent4: The wise elder inthroned the young prince on the ancient throne.
meanings.sent5: Inthrone the wise wizard on the enchanted throne to seek counsel.
